document_data.name: Zokan Thunderer
document_data.mainbody: '''Zokan Thunderer''' was the chieftain of the [[Elk tribe]] of the [[Uthgardt]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Zokan was well known for his barbaric nature. He was regarded as possibly the ugliest, rudest, richest, wiliest, and the most feared and hated bandit leader in the [[North]].
document_data.Activities:
His warriors raided incessantly, at least where the usual tribal migrations of the Elk took them, which ranged around the [[Evermoors]] and the plains east of the [[Dessarin]]. Under Zokan, almost any traveler or region was fair game, including other Uthgardt tribes. They were suspected of having links to [[Luskan]], and under Zokan [[cleric]]s of [[Talos]] gained ground. 

He worshiped [[Auril]] and Talos.
document_data.Reputation: To those outside of his tribe, Zokan was considered to be little more than a vulgar thug.
